loginDialog.title: Welcome back!
loginDialog.description: This email is already linked to a Yorby account. Please sign in to continue with your application.

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Your Documents
uploadDocuments.description: Upload your resume/CV and any other relevant documents (PDF, DOC, DOCX, Max 10MB per file)

existingDocuments.title: Your Existing Documents
existingDocuments.description: Select which documents you'd like to include with this application
existingDocuments.noDocuments: No existing documents found. Please upload your resume/CV.

selectedDocuments.title: Selected Documents
selectedDocuments.description: These documents will be submitted with your application

documentSelection.title: Resume, Cover Letter, and Other Documents
documentSelection.description: Choose up to 5 documents to include with your application. You can select from existing files or upload new ones. You can upload documents in PDF, TXT, PNG, or JPG.
documentSelection.maxFilesError: You can select up to 5 files
documentSelection.noFilesError: Please select at least one file
documentSelection.noDocuments: No documents uploaded yet. Upload your resume and other documents to apply.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Add links to your portfolio, GitHub, LinkedIn, or any other relevant information that showcases your work.
additionalInfo.placeholder: e.g., https://github.com/yourusername, Portfolio link, LinkedIn profile...

userInfo.title: Your Information
userInfo.description: Please provide your contact information to continue with your application

applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
applicationSubmitted.description: Your application has been successfully submitted. The hiring team will review it and get back to you soon.
applicationSubmitted.notYou: Not you? You can apply again with a different email address.

confirmEmail.title: Application Successfully Submitted!
confirmEmail.description: Please confirm your email address to complete your application

errors.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

resendForm.successMessage: Email sent successfully! Please check your inbox.

technicalRequirements.title: Technical Requirements
technicalRequirements.description: Ensure you have a working camera and microphone. The AI interviewer will interact with you in real-time.

duration.title: Assessment Duration
duration.description: This optional assessment typically takes 15-30 minutes. You can complete it now or come back later.

expectations.title: What to Expect
expectations.description: The AI interviewer will ask you questions relevant to the position. This helps showcase your skills beyond your resume and gives you an edge over other candidates.

tips.title: Tips for Success
items: Test your audio and video before starting
Speak clearly and maintain eye contact with the camera
Remember: This is optional but highly recommended to stand out

errors.connectingToAgent: There was an error connecting to the agent

processing.title: Processing Interview

connecting.title: Connecting to interview...

realInterview.title: Optional Video Assessment
realInterview.description: This assessment helps you stand out among other candidates. Completely optional but highly recommended.

delete.title: Delete Stage
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{stageName}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.descriptionWithCandidates: "{stageName}" has {count, plural, =1 {1 candidate} other {# candidates}} assigned to it. Choose where to move {count, plural, =1 {this candidate} other {these candidates}} before deleting the stage.
delete.lastStage: Are you sure you want to delete "{stageName}"? This is your last remaining stage. You can create new stages later.
delete.lastStageWithCandidates: Deleting "{stageName}" will remove your last application stage. {count, plural, =1 {The 1 candidate} other {All # candidates}} currently in this stage will be moved to "unassigned" status.
delete.reassignHelpText: {count, plural, =1 {This candidate} other {These # candidates}} will be moved to the selected stage.

upgradeNudge.title: Unlock Unlimited Interviews Now
upgradeNudge.description: Your free tier gives you {count} candidate interviews across all job listings. Upgrade to Premium and remove all limits—conduct unlimited interviews and scale your hiring instantly.

header.title: Upgrade to Yorby Pro
header.subtitle: Get unlimited candidate interviews with usage-based pricing

howItWorks.title: How usage billing works:
howItWorks.description1: Your subscription includes 100 candidate interviews per month.
howItWorks.description2: If you need more, additional interviews are charged at $0.50 each.
howItWorks.description3: Usage resets monthly on your billing date, so you get a fresh 100 interviews each month.
howItWorks.description4: Perfect for scaling teams - pay only for what you use beyond the included quota.

upgradeForm.termsNotice: By upgrading, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

interviewInvitation.title: Tell Your Story Beyond Your Resume
interviewInvitation.description: Most hiring stops at your resume. We believe you're more than a piece of paper. Take this optional assessment to showcase your experience, skills, and personality directly to the hiring team.

shareExperience.title: Share Your Real Experience
shareExperience.description: Discuss your work history, projects, and achievements in your own words

multipleQuestions.title: Multiple Question Types
multipleQuestions.description: Mix of behavioral and technical questions designed for this role

quickConvenient.title: Quick & Convenient
quickConvenient.description: Complete in 15-20 minutes, anytime that works for you

interviewInvitation.footer: You can always come back later to complete the assessment if you change your mind.
